title: 425. Remembrance of Economic Crises Past
description: Christina Romer was a top White House economist during the Great Recession. As a researcher, she specializes in the Great Depression. She tells us what those disasters can (and can’t) teach us about the Covid crash.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
